SELECT A.GRP_ID, A.GRP_NM, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, COUNT(B.USERID) AS EXPRT_CNT FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT_GRP_MAPNG B ON A.GRP_ID = B.GRP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.USE_YN = #{searchUseYn}
GROUP BY A.GRP_ID
SELECT GRP_ID ,GRP_NM ,USE_YN ,REG_DT FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_GRP WHERE GRP_ID = #{grpId}

SELECT C.USERID ,C.ACNT ,C.NM ,C.EML ,C.MOBLPHON ,C.REG_DT ,C.MDFCN_DT FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_GRP A INNER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT_GRP_MAPNG B ON A.GRP_ID = B.GRP_ID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER C ON C.USERID = B.USERID WHERE A.GRP_ID = #{grpId}

SELECT A.USERID, A.ACNT, A.NM, A.EML, A.MOBLPHON, GROUP_CONCAT(B.CD_NM SEPARATOR', ') RGN_CD_NM, GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD_NM SEPARATOR', ') SBJCT_CD_NM, GROUP_CONCAT(D.CRTFCT_NM SEPARATOR', ') CRTFCT_NM, A.REG_DT, A.MDFCN_DT FROM TB_CMM_USER A INNER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT E ON A.USERID = E.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.USERID, B.CD_NM FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_ACTVT_RGN A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.RGN_CD = B.CD ) B ON A.USERID = B.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.USERID, B.CD_NM FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_SBJCT A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.SBJCT_CD = B.CD ) C ON A.USERID = C.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ASS_EXPRT_CRTFCT D ON A.USERID = D.USERID GROUP BY A.USERID
